description.title: Impact of the reclassification of housing associations into the public sector: Appendix E
description.summary: The impact of the reclassification of English private registered providers of social housing (often referred to  as housing associations), from the private to the public corporation sector on public sector net borrowing and net debt.
description.metaDescription: Indicators of UK government fiscal performance: Public Sector Current Budget Deficit (PSCB), Net Borrowing (PSNB), Net Debt (PSND) and PSND as a percentage of GDP.
